name: Classic Margarita Recipe
description: The perfect margarita is all about fresh, crisp flavors, with tequila barely tempered by triple sec and lime. After testing all the ratios, this is the one we reach for.
recipeIngredient: 1 lime wedge, plus 2 lime wheels for garnish
1 tablespoon coarse salt, for glass rims

recipeInstructions.text: Run lime wedge around the outer rims of 2 rocks glasses and dip rims in salt. Set aside.
In a cocktail shaker, combine tequila, Cointreau, and lime juice. Fill with ice and shake until thoroughly chilled, about 15 seconds (the bottom of a metal shaker should frost over).
Fill glasses with fresh ice and strain margarita into both glasses. Garnish with lime wheels and serve.
